name: A Guide to Nighttime Swimming and Tending to a Broken Heart
name_original: A Guide to Nighttime Swimming and Tending to a Broken Heart
description:
A Guide to Nighttime Swimming and Tending to a Broken Heart

This is a solo-lyrical game you can only play when you're broken hearted. 

Feel free to avail a community copy wether you're drowning or not.
